data.text:
@1Arnold_Friend @allypetersnews Excuse me?

What good do the mandates do?

If you supported the mandates, you are either brainwashed or willfully ignorant. Which is it?

If vax works, you don't need mandate. If it doesn't work, then you don't want mandate.
@allypetersnews @News_8 While every other school is announcing that the masks can go. I feel bad for that school district.
@allypetersnews She is going to keep the mandate in place. https://t.co/Mvgr0tnPMm

@allypetersnews Stop the mandate madness.

At this point, anyone that still supports these really nonsensical mandates needs psychological help.
